thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 45 of 3060
thread.title: Ssacrey

author: Ssacrey
title: Ssacrey
text: Found an awesome price for an suv for a week but was disappointed when I Called to arrange for it to be dropped at the pal hanger in Halifax. The unfortunately don't drop vehicea off even though I was willing to pay in advance and give my licence number. They advised I need to sign papers. I feel that I could of dropped in or they could of come and got me with the papers. As I was travelling with small children thus was convenient. I will use this service in future because it did give me the best price. But maybe should include what each company offers in services.
